text: Fagner Leite de Siqueira (born 10 September 1988), commonly known as Fagner, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a midfielder.Vila Nova acerta com volante Fagner, que já se apresenta no domingo; Globo Esporte, 5 August 2016 ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League
